articles.title: National Meeting held
articles.content:
National Meeting Held
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture here on Monday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the meeting were senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, working people in the city, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots, visiting groups, compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, delivered a report.
					
					 The reporter said that it is the greatest fortune and privilege of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the leader as he is unanimously praised by mankind as the most outstanding political elder and the peerlessly brilliant commander of the present era. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il carried forward the immortal Juche idea in all fields and steadily developed it in depth with his outstanding wisdom and through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, thus performing great ideological and theoretical exploits which brightly indicate the way of achieving the victory of the Korean revolution and accomplishing the human cause of independence, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has led along the road of steady victory the revolutionary cause of the WPK, the cause of socialism, with his outstanding political caliber and extraordinary leadership ability, thereby performing undying exploits which will remain shining forever.
					
					 He has turned the DPRK into a socialist state of Juche with invincible might and brought a heyday of the greatest prosperity in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years to this land, putting the dignity and national power of Juche Korea on the highest level. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il established the Korean-style state leadership system with the National Defence Commission as the core as required by the Songun era, thus providing a legal and institutional guarantee for the Songun revolutionary leadership and placing the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks on a new higher stage. By doing so he enabled the service personnel and people to confidently advance along the road of Songun with a more powerful political weapon for putting spurs to the building of a rich and powerful country. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il unrolled a far-reaching plan for building a thriving socialist nation despite a rigorous trial the DPRK had to weather while waging the struggle to defend socialism, powerfully arousing the whole party and army and all the people to the drive for building powerful state and economic potential commensurate with a political and military power. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il set the grandiose goal to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, thereby encouraging the service personnel and people in their efforts to effect a new great revolutionary surge on all fronts of socialist construction by inheriting the tradition of the great Chollima upswing. 
					
					 This was an event of special mention as it helped put the cause of building a thriving nation on a higher stage and bring about a historic turning point in the development of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The reporter underlined the need for the people to bring about a decisive turn in the improvement of the people's standard of living, build a thriving socialist nation as early as possible and bring earlier the final victory of the cause of national reunification and the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Steadfast is the stand of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations and pave the way for national reunification on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reporter noted, calling for improving the inter-Korean relations, promoting national reconciliation and cooperation and waging a dynamic struggle to achieve the unity of the whole nation to bring earlier the day of national reunification.
					
					 He underscored the need to put an end to the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. through dialogue and negotiations, develop the good neighborly and friendly relations with other countries under the banner of independence, peace and friendship and work hard to realize global independence.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for Kim Il Sung's nation led by Kim Jong Il, great man born in Mt. Paektu, who has performed undying exploits that will shine long in the history of the country by leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution for the last several decades, bringing earlier a rosy future to it.
					
					 Similar events took place in various provinces, cities and counties of the DPRK.

articles.title: Letter and Gift form Chinese Company
articles.content:
Letter and Gift form Chinese Company
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter and a gift by the chairman of the Board of Directors of the Wanxiang Group of China on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The letter and gift were conveyed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Feb 10.

articles.title: International Figure Skating Paektusan Prize Opens
articles.content:
International Figure Skating Paektusan Prize Opens
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The 19th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize opened with due ceremony at the Ice Rink here on Monday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and the chairman of a friendly party and others and a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China led by its Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and other overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and foreign guests.
					
					 The figure skaters of the DPRK, Russia, Hungary, Belarus, Switzerland, France, the Czech Republic, UK, Australia and Ukraine entered the venue of the opening ceremony.
					
					 Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, noted in his opening address that the festival provides a good opportunity to boost the unity and cooperation among sports persons who love peace and justice.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by a group performance given by DPRK figure skaters.
					
					 To the tune of the song "Confetti of Best Wishes" figure skaters presented graceful and refined rhythms extending highest glory and best wishes to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They performed on the ice-rink "Push Back the Frontiers of Science", "Higher and Faster", "Let Us Meet at the Front" and other numbers reflecting the iron faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by a demonstration performance.
					
					 The figure skaters of the DPRK and other countries who gave a good account of themselves in international contests were applauded by the spectators for presenting refined and high skills and unique movements based on a good ensemble.

articles.title: Synchronized Swimming Exhibition
articles.content:
Synchronized Swimming Exhibition
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A demonstration performance of synchronized swimming took place in the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex on Monday to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jung Rin, Yang Hyong Sop and others officials were among the spectators.
					
					 Among the spectators were congratulatory groups of overseas compatriots and Koreans from overseas staying in the socialist homeland and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign guests on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The performers depicted beautiful frost flowers carrying boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They presented a series of movements requiring high skills to the merry tunes of songs "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu", "Taehongdan of 3,000-ri", "Push Back the Frontiers of Science," "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front" and "Let the Soldiers Be Heroes".

articles.title: Performance Given by "2. 16 Art Prize" Participants
articles.content:
Performance Given by "2. 16 Art Prize" Participants
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by successful participants in the 19th individual contest for "February 16 Art Prize" at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall on Monday in celebration of February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage were a soprano "Song Devoted to Comrade Kim Jong Il", a small haegum recital of an immortal famous masterpiece "Where Are You, Dear General", piano solo "Song of Ploughing", a solo in contralto "Fog Creeps up Jong Il Peak", female folk song solo "Yangsando" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers successfully represented the greatness of Kim Jong Il who has performed the undying feats to remain long recorded in the history by leading the Korean revolution to victory for the last several decades after being born as a son of the legendary guerillas and the boundless loyalty of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK who follow him with boundless reverence, entrusting their destiny and future to him.
					
					 Also put on the stage were middle-sized haegum solo of an immortal famous masterpiece "Song of Sea of Blood", kayagum solo "Song of the Sea", high-pitched tone fife solo "Spring Has Come" and other numbers.
					
					 Among the audience were working people in the city and school youth and children.

articles.title: Lots of Gifts from 170 Countries so far
articles.content:
Lots of Gifts from 170 Countries so far
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts carrying best wishes by heads of many states and governments and leaders of political parties, personages of various strata, organizations and people of broad strata on significant occasions.
					 He received tens of thousands of gifts from more than 170 countries of the world. 
					
					 The number of the gifts he received in the 1980s plus those presented to him in the 1960s and the 1970s of the last century reached more than 27,000.
					
					 He was presented with hundreds of gifts by at least 100 countries in October, Juche 79 (1990), the significant 45th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The number of gifts presented to him rapidly increased from the middle of the 1990s. 
					
					 He received more than 14,000 gifts from progressive people in the last decade when he resolutely frustrated the moves of the imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle socialist Korea by displaying his iron faith and brilliant strategy, thus demonstrating the dignity and honor of the DPRK.
					
					 He received more than 2,400 gifts in one year in this period. He was presented with more than 300 gifts when visiting Russia in 2001. He received more than 660 gifts on February 16, 2002 alone.
					
					 The gifts presented to him are most profound in their ideological contents, unprecedented in their varieties and styles and rarest in their value.

articles.title: Celebrated by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Celebrated by Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Feb. 13 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon and other compatriots and youth and students in Japan.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in a report said that the revolutionary history of Kim Jong Il is an immortal history in which he has led the revolution and construction only to victory true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and an ennobling history of believing in people as in Heaven in which he has brought happiness to the people of the homeland.
					
					 Recalling that last year the homeland greeted an exciting era when people's ideal was materialized thanks to the undying Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the reporter praised him as the destiny of all Koreans, a symbol of victory and a creator of happiness.
					
					 He reiterated the determination of the Koreans in Japan to cherish the firmer faith that they are sure to emerge victorious under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and advance along the road of patriotism full of conviction and hope for the future of the homeland, always remembering the loving care shown by him for them.
					
					 The officials of Chongryon will breathe the same breath with the people in the homeland who are bringing about a leap forward in their drive to build a thriving nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and lay an overall foundation for bringing about a new era in the movement of Koreans in Japan this year, thus making a signal turn in intensifying the patriotic movement.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from the Chongryon Central Standing Committee was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 An art performance "Song of General Kim Jong Il Resounding in Alien Land" was given at the hall of Joson University of Chongryon on Feb. 9.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee for the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, and Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, made public a joint statement on Feb. 8 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Korean people have firmly preserved the revolutionary idea and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and dynamically pushed ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 His outstanding Songun leadership is the source of the strength that enabled the army and people of the DPRK to protect the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation and consolidate Korean-style socialism despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK on this significant auspicious day.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the army and people of the DPRK will continue to advance along the road of Songun under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: February Holiday Marked in Italy, Brazil and Egypt
articles.content:
February Holiday Marked in Italy, Brazil and Egypt
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar, lecture and round-table talks were held in Italy, Brazil and Egypt on Feb. 5 and 9 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 Present there were figures of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Firenze City Office in Italy, the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the Brazilian Communist Party and the Workers' Center and the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt and other people.
					
					 Osvaldo Pesce, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, in his report at the seminar highly praised Kim Jong Il as the greatest man who has devoted himself to the happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil in the lecture noted that the DPRK is pushing ahead with the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation despite all the sanctions of the imperialists and their moves to provoke a war thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il. He declared the party would extend full solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to achieve national reunification and build a thriving nation.
					
					 Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, said at the round-table talks that Kim Jong Il, creditable successor to the cause of President Kim Il Sung, has cemented the single-minded unity of all the service members and people and boosted the national power in every way by pursuing Songun politics, thereby turning the DPRK into an impregnable socialist bulwark. He expressed belief that the Korean people would win only victory in the future, too.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to DPRK embassies in Hanoi, Mexico City and Damascus by the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Viet Nam, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministries of Defence, Public Security, Culture, Sports and Tourism, the Central Committee of the Fatherland Front, the Diplomatic Corp Service Department, the Peasants' Union, the Ho Chi Minh Museum, the Viettel Group, the Thang Long Corporation of Vietnam, the Workers' Party of Mexico, the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Institute for the Study of Juche Idea, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of Juche Idea, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of the President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the MexicoÔºçKorea Friendship Association, the chairman of the National Counci
					 l of the National  Assembly of Vietnam, the Vice-President of Syria, regional deputy secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party, the director of the Organizational Department of the Regional Leadership of the party, the foreign minister, the minister of Defence, the chief of the general staff of the army and armed forces, the chairman of the General Federation of the Trade Unions, and the  chairman of the General Union of Peasants of Syria from 8 to 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra 
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated the concert given by the Unhasu Orchestra in celebration of the lunar New Year.
					 He acknowledged the cheers of the audience and warmly congratulated them on the lunar New Year.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of the National Anthem. Put on the stage were narration and music "The Night Seeing 2009 Out", mixed chorus "Let's Drink a Toast," female sextet and chorus "Greeting Spring on Jong Il Peak", male solo and chorus "Mt. Paektu, Cradle of Revolution," female solo "Song of Flowers", saxophone sextet "Song of Sliced Radish Kimchi," orchestra "Rich Harvest Comes to the Chongsan Plain", narration and music "Push Back the Frontiers of Science" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the course of shining victory along which the service personnel and people of the DPRK have dashed ahead like the wind towards the high eminence of a thriving nation holding high the torch for a new great revolutionary surge lit by Kim Jong Il and powerfully demonstrated their iron faith and will to make another leap forward this year to usher in a great heyday of prosperity.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that they presented a splendid concert rich in its ideological contents and high in artistry as it is pervaded with the spirit of the times and national flavor. He highly appreciated their success in the performance.
					
					 Noting that the service personnel and people of the DPRK have performed eye-opening miracles and exploits since the outset of their new year's drive, he expressed the great expectation and belief that they would bring about once again great innovations and a big leap forward in all sectors and thus adorn the year 2010 as a year of great victory to go down in the history of the country.
					
					 Among the audience were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and department directors of the C.C., the WPK Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and  Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK and Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Serbian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Serbian President
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Boris Tadzic, President of Serbia, on Monday on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the President of Serbia success in his work for the stability of the country and the well-being of the people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets to Serbian PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets to Serbian PM
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) --DPRK Premier Kim Yong Il Monday sent a message of greetings to Mirko Cvetkovic, Prime Minister of Serbia, on the occasion of its national day.
					The message wished the Prime Minister and the people of Serbia successes in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Serbian counterpart Vuk Jeremic on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday met the art troupe of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Ryong Su, head of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan for celebrating February 16, and had a talk with it in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre. 
					 On hand were Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others and Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the association who is head of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A song and dance performance of the art troupe of Koreans in Japan for celebrating February 16 "We Live Close to the General Kim Jong Il" took place at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday. 
					 Invited to see the performance were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others.
					
					 The congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and overseas compatriots were also among the audience.
					
					 The Korean artistes from Japan put on the stage peculiar numbers they had prepared with the single desire to significantly celebrate the February holiday.
					
					The performers in female solo "Thinking of Their Father" and various numbers highly sang of the ardent longing for General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the destiny of the fellow countrymen and kind-hearted father, and the firm will to hold him in higher esteem.
					
					 They also successfully represented the firm resolutions of the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan to steadfastly advance along the road of patriotism.

articles.title: Lunar New Year Celebrated
articles.content:
Lunar New Year Celebrated
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) --Working people in various parts of the country joyously celebrated the lunar New Year.
					 On the morning of the day service personnel and working people of various strata and school youth and children visited Mansu Hill and various other places where the statues of President Kim Il Sung stand and the portraits of the smiling President are displayed to lay floral baskets and flowers before them and offer New Year greetings to him. 
					
					They visited their teachers, elders, neighbors, relatives and friends and exchanged greetings with them and promised them to bring about great innovations and leap forward in the on-going general march.
					
					 Pyongyangites from all walks of life visited the venue of the 14th Kimjongilia Festival and went round the immortal flowers in full bloom highly praising the great man.
					
					 Various parts of the city including Kim Il Sung Square were crowded with school children playing folk games such as letting various kinds of kites fly, top spinning, shuttlecock game and rope skipping.
					
					 Working people and school youth and children in different parts of the country joyfully spent the day with sports and amusement games and folk games.
					
					 Drawing particular interest was the stage on which members of the women's union in Sariwon, North Hwanghae Province introduced Korean etiquette.
					
					 Public catering establishments in Pyongyang and other places of the country were busy serving working people with abundant and diverse holiday diet.

articles.title: Protest Candlelight Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Candlelight Rally Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a candlelight rally in front of the building of the Democratic Labor Party (DLP) in Seoul on Feb. 11 to denounce the puppet authorities for their suppression of opposition parties.
					 At the rally speakers accused the authorities of egging the prosecution, police and conservative media onto fabricate all sorts of "charges" against the DLP and progressive organizations in a bid to crack down upon them and, at the same time, resorting to violence after misleading public opinion.
					
					 What remains to be done in the south Korean society at present is to force the present regime to step down as early as possible, they held, declaring that they would boost solidarity with the people from all walks of life in order to put an end to the authorities' repressive rule and protect the progressive forces.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Evading Responsibility for Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Evading Responsibility for Past Crimes 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and other civic and social organizations in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 10 at which they chided the Japanese authorities' irresponsible attitude of evading their responsibility for settling Japan's past crimes.
					 The organizations underscored the need for the Japanese government to take immediate measures for making an apology and reparation for its past crimes and demanded it open to the public all the documents related to the south Korea-Japan "agreement" and stop distorting history textbooks and working hard to grab Tok Islets.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia concierto de Orquesta Unhasu por Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia concierto de Orquesta Unhasu por Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio el concierto del Ano Nuevo Lunar de la Orquesta Unhasu.
					El dio calidas felicitaciones por el Ano Nuevo Lunar a los espectadores respondiendo a las aclamaciones de ellos. 
					
					En la funcion iniciada con la interpretacion del "Himno Nacional" se presentaron la narracion y musica "Noche de despedida del ano que expira", el coro mixto "Brindemos", el sexteto femenino y coro "Acogida de la primavera en el pico Jong Il", el solo masculino y coro "El monte Paektu es tierra natal de la revolucion", el solo femenino "Cancion de flor", el sexteto de saxofon "Cancion de Kimchikakdugi", la musica orquestal "Abundante cosecha en campos de Chongsan", la narracion y musica "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta", y otras diversas piezas. 
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes interpretaron en tono patetico la orgullosa trayectoria de victorias que han recorrido a galopes hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera levantando la antorcha del nuevo gran auge revolucionario encendida por el Dirigente y mostraron la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de registrar de nuevo un gran salto en este ano para abrir la era de gran prosperidad. 
					
					  El Dirigente se puso muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido ese concierto magnifico y perfecto en lo ideo-artistico, en que se palpan fuertemente el espiritu de la epoca y la idiosincrasia, y elogio altamente sus exitos logrados en la ocasion.
					
					 Senalando que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, que entraron ya en la campana del Ano Nuevo, crean milagros y meritos brillantes desde el comienzo de enero, expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que ellos haran de 2010 el ano de grandes victorias, que se registre eternamente en los anales de la patria, al volver a producir grandes innovaciones y saltos en todos los sectores.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares; el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC,  y otros miembros directivos del ejercito y de las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC y el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kang Sok Ju.

articles.title: Acto central por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Acto central por el 16 de febrero 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el dia de natalicio (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Al conclave asistieron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los grupos de felicitacion, delegaciones y grupos de visita de los coreanos en ultramar, los compatriotas radicados en otros paises y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					Tener como lider al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, elogiado unanimemente por la humanidad como el mas ilustre veterano politico de la epoca actual y general insigne sin igual, es la maxima fortuna y el privilegio mas grande que corresponden unicamente al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea, comenzo el informador y prosiguio:
					
					Al continuar plenamente y profundizar sin parar la inmortal idea Juche a base de su extraordinaria perspicacia y dinamicas actividades ideo-teoricas, el Dirigente realizo la gran hazana ideo-teorica de iluminar el camino hacia la victoria de la revolucion coreana y el cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia de la humanidad.
					
					En particular, el ha sido el artifice de otras imborrables proezas, que se transmitiran eternamente de siglo en siglo, conduciendo su inigualable capacidad politica y directiva a la senda de victorias la causa revolucionaria de nuestro partido, la socialista.
					
					Situo en el plano cimero la dignidad y el poderio nacional de la Corea del Juche al convertir nuestra patria en el Estado socialista del Juche con invencible poderio y abrir en la tierra patria la era de prosperidad sin precedente en la historia nacional de 5 milenios.
					
					Dio la garantia legal e institucional de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun al establecer el sistema de direccion estatal al estilo coreano, cuyo eje es el Comite de Defensa Nacional, conforme a la demanda de la era del Songun y consolido en la etapa mas alta la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias.
					
					De esta manera, hizo que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos avanzaran con gran fe por la unica senda del Songun contando con el arma politica mas poderosa que estimula la construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					Aun en medio de duras pruebas que se presentaron en la batalla por defender el socialismo, trazo el gran proyecto de construir una gran potencia prospera socialista y llamo energicamente a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a la lucha por procurar el gran poderio economico nacional que convenga al aspecto de potencia politico-militar
					
					El Dirigente presento la ambiciosa meta de abrir en el ano 2012, en que se cumplira el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, las puertas de la gran potencia prospera e hizo registrar en todos los sectores de la construccion socialista el nuevo y gran auge revolucionario dando continuidad a la tradicion del gran auge de Chollima.
					
					Esto es un evento especial que llevo a la etapa mas alta la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera y trajo el periodo de cambio historico en el curso de la revolucion coreana.
					
					  Es preciso imprimir un cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida del pueblo, construir cuanto antes la gran potencia prospera socialista y adelantar el triunfo final de la causa de reunificacion de la patria y la revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					  Es firme e invariable nuestra posicion de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y allanar el camino de la reunificacion de la patria a base de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					A fin de adelantar el dia de reunificacion de la patria, hay que mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, promover la reconciliacion y la cooperacion de la nacion y dinamizar la lucha por alcanzar la unidad de toda la nacion. 
					
					  Hace falta acabar con las relaciones hostiles entre la RPDC y Estados Unidos mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones, desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y buena vecindad entre los paises bajo la bandera de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y luchar energicamente por verificar la independencia en todo el mundo. 
					
					  Siempre habra victorias y glorias en el futuro camino de la nacion de Kim Il Sung, que tiene al frente de su avance al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, gran hombre sin par del Paektu, quien durante varios decenios sagrados de su orientacion sobre el PTC y la revolucion coreana, acumulo inmortales hazanas a ser transmitidas eternamente en los anales de la patria y anticipa el futuro maravilloso.
					
					  Por otra parte, se realizaron actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: Inaugurado XIX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
articles.content:
Inaugurado XIX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo inaugurado el dia 15 en el capitalino Complejo de Patinaje bajo Techo el 19o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan.
					En el acto participaron el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el presidente de partido amigo y otros funcionarios, los coreanos residentes en ultramar incluyendo el grupo de felicitacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China encabezada por su presidenta Choe Un Bok, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Entraron en el salon los jugadores de la RPDC, Rusia, Hungria, Belarus, Suiza, Francia, Chesco, Gran Bretana, Australia y Ucrania.
					
					El presidente del Comite de Direccion de Deportes, Pak Hak Son, en su discurso inaugural, senalo que el presente festival sirve de un motivo para fortalecer la solidaridad y la cooperacion entre los deportistas que aman a la paz y tienen la justicia.
					
					En el acto inaugural hubo la representacion colectiva de los jugadores coreanos.
					
					Al compas de la melodia de la cancion "Confeti de felicitacion" los ejecutantes mostraron los movimientos hermosos y habiles reflejando la maxima gloria y el saludo de felicitacion al Dirigente.
					
					Pusieron sobre el hielo las piezas intituladas "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta", "Mas alto, mas rapido", "Encontremonos en el frente", etc. que reflejan la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea. 
					
					Despues de terminada la inauguracion, hubo la representacion ejemplar. 
					
					Los patinadores artisticos de Corea y varios paises, que lograron excelentes exitos en los juegos internacionales, fueron objetos de grandes aplausos al cumplir mejor los movimientos particulares con habilidades probadas y talentosas y el acoplamiento bien organizado.

articles.title: Funcion de ganadores del Concurso por Premio Artistico 16 de Febrero
articles.content:
Funcion de ganadores del Concurso por Premio Artistico 16 de Febrero
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la Casa de Musica Yun I Sang la funcion de los ganadores del 19o Concurso Individual por el Premio Artistico del 16 de Febrero que se realiza con motivo de este dia de nacimiento del Dirigente  Kim Jong Il.
					En la ocasion se presentaron las piezas de varios generos como el soprano "Al camarada Kim Jong Il", el solo de haegum pequeno (instrumento musical coreano de cuerdas) de la obra maestra "?Donde esta el querido General?", el solo de piano "Cancion del arador", la bajo "La neblina ronda el pico Jong Il", el solo folclorico femenino "Yangsando", etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron magnificamente la noble personalidad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien nacio como hijo del legendario guerrillero y realizo imborrables proezas a ser transmitidas eternamente en la historia conduciendo durante varios decenios a la victoria a la patria y la revolucion, y la ardiente fidelidad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo que le confian enteramente su destino y futuro.
					
					En el repertorio figuran tambien el solo de haegum mediano de la obra maestra "Mar de sangre" el solo de kayagum "Cancion del mar", el solo de jangsaenap "Ryonggangginari", el solo de flauta "Pais de la manana radiada por los rayos del sol del Juche", el solo de jotae "Ha llegado la nueva primavera", etc. 
					
					Disfrutaron la funcion los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares capitalinos.

articles.title: Enviados a embajadas coreanas cestos de flores por 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Enviados a embajadas coreanas cestos de flores por 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fueron enviados del dia 8 al 10 los cestos de flores a las embajadas coreanas.
					Las entidades remitentes son las siguientes:
					
					La Comision de Asuntos Exteriores del CC del Partido Comunista, los Ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores, de Defensa Nacional, de Seguridad Publica, de Cultura, Deporte y Turismo, el Comite Central del Frente de la Patria, el Departamento para los Cuerpos Diplomaticos, la Union de Campesinos, el Museo Ho Chi Minh, el Grupo Viettel y la Corporacion Thang Long de Vietnam; el Partido del Trabajo, el Partido Socialista del Pueblo y el Partido Popular Socialista, de Mexico, el Comite Mexicano de Estudio del Kimilsunismo, el Instituto de la Idea Juche de Mexico, el Comite de Coordinacion Nacional de Mexico para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, la Union de Amigos Mexicanos en Memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Comite Mexicano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea y la Asociacion de Amistad Mexico-Corea.
					
					  Tambien lo hicieron el presidente del Consejo Nacional de la Asamblea Nacional de Vietnam y las personalidades de Siria como el vicepresidente, el subsecretario regional y jefe del departamento organizativo de la direccion regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, el ministro de Defensa Nacional, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito y Fuerzas Armadas, el presidente de la Federacion General de Sindicatos de Trabajadores y el presidente de la Union General de Campesinos Sirios.
